sprint_goal: Establish the core backend transformation engine, database schema for scripts/audit, and security sandboxing. Focus on repository-centric tasks.
epic_coverage: Core Data Transformation Engine, Security & Compliance
key_deliverables: Functional Jint sandbox service; EF Core models and repositories for scripts/versions; Initial AuditLog service.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a script executing in the sandboxed engine via an integration test; Show the generated database schema for scripts and audit logs.
success_criteria: All backend services are unit/integration tested; Jint sandbox passes security tests; DB migrations are successfully applied.
mitigation_strategies: Dedicated security code review; Automated negative testing for CLR access.
burndown_target: Complete foundational backend tasks for future sprints.

sprint_goal: Expose core script management via RESTful APIs and build the foundational UI editor with Monaco, focusing on repository-centric API tasks.
key_deliverables: CRUD API for scripts/versions; RBAC on APIs; Audit logging for CRUD; Reusable Monaco editor component.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate script creation via API using Swagger/Postman; Show the Monaco editor rendered in the React app; Show audit logs for API actions.
success_criteria: API endpoints are fully tested and secured; Monaco editor spike is complete and component is built; Audit logs are generated for repository actions.
mitigation_strategies: Start with a technical spike to de-risk Monaco integration.
burndown_target: Deliver functional APIs and the core UI building block.

sprint_goal: Deliver the complete end-to-end user flow for creating, editing, and previewing scripts, including securing script storage with encryption.
key_deliverables: Fully functional script management UI (CRUD); Script preview with sample and live data; Encryption at rest for script content.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate creating, listing, editing, and deleting a script from the UI; Show script preview working with live data; Show encrypted script content in the database.
success_criteria: E2E tests for CRUD and preview pass; Database inspection confirms script content is encrypted.
risk_factors: Key management for encryption service in production environment.
mitigation_strategies: Follow Microsoft best practices for DPAPI key management.
burndown_target: Complete a major, demo-ready feature slice.

sprint_goal: Deliver advanced script versioning features (history, diff, revert), add operational monitoring, and complete the design for the compliance-grade audit trail.
epic_coverage: Transformation Management UI, Security & Compliance, Operational Readiness & DevOps
key_deliverables: Script versioning UI with diff and revert; Prometheus metrics endpoint; Design document for compliant audit trail.
demo_objectives: Show version history for a script; Compare two versions; Revert to an old version; Show metrics in a Prometheus test instance; Present the audit trail design.
success_criteria: E2E tests for versioning pass; Metrics endpoint is functional; Audit trail design document is approved by compliance expert.
risk_factors: Complexity of Monaco Diff Editor; Audit trail design failing compliance review (RISK-004).
mitigation_strategies: Early POC for diff editor; Early engagement with compliance expert for design review.
burndown_target: Complete advanced features and de-risk compliance implementation.

sprint_goal: Implement the high-risk legacy data migration and the compliance-grade audit trail storage solution. Finalize operational readiness tasks.
key_deliverables: Idempotent migration script for legacy data; Documented cutover/rollback plan; Implemented compliant audit trail storage; Performance benchmark test suite.
demo_objectives: Execute the migration script against a test database and validate results; Demonstrate the log integrity verification process; Show performance benchmark test running in CI.
success_criteria: Migration script successfully passes staging dry-run; Rollback plan is tested and verified; Audit trail implementation passes security review.
risk_factors: Legacy data migration failure (RISK-003); Rollback procedure failure (RISK-007).
mitigation_strategies: Multiple staging dry-runs for migration; 'Game day' exercise to test the rollback procedure.
external_dependencies: Access to legacy production data snapshot.
integration_windows: Staging environment migration dry-run on days 5-6.
burndown_target: Complete all high-risk operational and compliance tasks for release readiness.
